name: Trello Label Overrides
description:
Makes using Trello as an Agile/SCRUM board more manageable.

- allows users to see labels
- orders labels based on prefix/contains css selectors
- shrinks stickers
additional_info:
v0.0.2

- added "separator" labels.  Separator labels need to be prefixed with "---"

v0.0.1

In order to make use of priority labels, you must prefix your labels either with a "." or "!".  Points-based labels should contain the "pts" identifier.  All other labels will be rendered after any priority and point labels
